item.head: Unpacking your suitcase, organizing your wardrobe and pressing your outfit upon arrival
Personalizing all your requests and needs throughout your stay with constant contact to Karim via SMS, WhatsApp, BBM or email
Providing your local daily newspaper (English or Arabic)
Polishing a pair of shoes each day between 4pm and 5pm
Personalized touches in your suite upon arrival
Possibility to arrange any celebration during your stay
Organizing dining in-suite or on your terrace, Karim can also offer you the possibility to tailor your dining experience with our Al Daif Chef.
Enjoy an exclusive foam bath with our signature scent, towel art and candles.
“Karim’s Good Morning”: your choice of coffee or tea delivered to your doorstep soon after your wakeup call
Facilitating your contribution to Al Ihsan through a choice of charities
